title: This one's for you, Paul.
content:
What not to do for your conference presentation: [_Stop your presentation before it kills again!_](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111104534/http:/headrush.typepad.com/creating_passionate_users/2005/06/kill_your_prese.html) (via InfoDesign)

What to buy if you are craving peanut butter and curry: [PB Loco](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111104534/http:/www.pbloco.com/)

What to read if you need a light in your life: [WikiQuote on Hope](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111104534/http:/en.wikiquote.org/wiki/Hope)

What to wear to your next client meeting if all is already lost: [Very Necessary](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111104534/http:/russelldavies.typepad.com/planning/2005/06/quiet_desperati.html)
author: Miss Tiffany

comments.content:
just for me? awwww! \*squish\*

my friend joey tells me he’ll show me where to buy curry chocolates when i’m in NYC. can’t wait!

We study curcumin (one of main ingredients in curry) in our lab. Has good nutritional benefits… [[google scholar search]](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111104534/http:/scholar.google.com/scholar?hl=en&lr=&c2coff=1&q=curcumin&btnG=Search) May be offset by the sugars they add to the chocolates though. :)

you can buy curry chocolates at Vosges Haut Chocolat in NY, CHI, Vegas, Miami and online at

[www.vosges.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20051111104534/http:/www.vosges.com/)
